The Build Back Better framework‚Äìwhich I will vote for‚Äìwill deliver millions of good-paying jobs, historic middle class tax cuts and lower costs for Texas families. Because when children are taken care of, parents can go back to work.

For too long, Texas families have been held back by soaring costs ‚Äì from child care to health care to education to the climate crisis. 

To unleash the full potential of every worker and family in our state, we must seize this once-in-a-century moment to Build Back Better.

During these uncertain times, one thing you can count on is affordable, reliable health care coverage. 

Through the healthcare expansion in the American Rescue Plan, 80% of families will pay less than $10 a month.
